nodes.text: Kime Enanrum was a well-known sculptor who lived during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. In 23 BBY, the sculptor created an ice statue that was displayed at a fundraiser in the Jrade District on the planet Coruscant. However, the intricately-crafted statue was accidentally destroyed by the notoriously maladroit Representative Jar Jar Binks, much to the sadness of Enanrum.

Kime Enanrum was a famous sculptor who worked during the waning decades of the Galactic Republic. At the time of the Separatist Crisis in 23 BBY, Enanrum sculptured an elaborate statue from ice, which was displayed at a gala fundraiser taking place in Jrade Plaza of the planet Coruscant's posh Jrade District. Unfortunately for the statue, Representative Jar Jar Binks of Naboo was invited to the gala. Binks, who was infamous for his clumsiness, managed to accidentally tuck the tablecloth upon which the statue rested into his cummerbund. At the same time, he attempted to catch tumbling canapés he had knocked from a nearby waiter, and, as a result, the Gungan Representative pulled down the statue, which shattered to pieces. The incident was reported by HoloNet News, and Enanrum, saddened by the loss of the statue, gave an interview in which the sculptor expressed regret for bringing the statue at the gala in the first place.

A successful sculptor, Kime Enanrum became renowned in that line of work. Enanrum took time in creating the statue for the gala fundraiser, and the resulting piece was considered intricately-crafted. Despite knowing that Binks, who had just two months prior demonstrated his clumsiness by deactivating the sky dome at the opening of the Endangered Shreebird Aviary, was invited to the gala, Enanrum nonetheless decided to display the statue, though the sculptor later regretted that decision. When the statue was destroyed, Enanrum became crestfallen.

Kime Enanrum was first mentioned in the in-universe HoloNet News Vol. 531 48 article Rep. Binks Destroys Ice Statue at Gala Fundraiser, part of the HoloNet News volume released on February 28, 2002. So far, Enanrum has also been mentioned in the entry for Jar Jar Binks in The Official Star Wars Fact File 54, and in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia.
